title: Algorithmic Solution for Systems of Linear Equations, in $\mathcal{O}(mn)$ time. (arXiv:2104.12570v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: We present a novel algorithm attaining excessively fast, the sought solution of linear systems of equations. The algorithm is short in its basic formulation and, by definition, vectorized, while the memory allocation demands are trivial, because, for each iteration, only one dimension of the given input matrix $\mathbf X$ is utilized. The execution time is very short compared with state-of-the-art methods, exhibiting $> \times 10^2$ speed-up and low memory allocation demands, especially for non-square Systems of Linear Equations, with ratio of equations versus features high (tall systems), or low (wide systems) accordingly. The accuracy is high and straightforwardly controlled, and the numerical results highlight the efficiency of the proposed algorithm, in terms of computation time, solution accuracy and memory demands. The paper also comprises a theoretical proof for the algorithmic convergence, and we extend the implementation of the proposed algorithmic rationale to feature selecti

translated_title: 在$\mathcal{O}(mn)$时间内解决线性方程组的算法解决方案
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种新颖的算法，可以以非常快的速度求解线性方程组的解。该算法在其基本形式上非常简短，并且根据定义进行向量化，而内存分配需求很低，因为对于每一次迭代，仅利用给定输入矩阵$\mathbf X$的一个维度。与现有方法相比，执行时间非常短，表现出超过$10^2$倍的加速比和较低的内存分配需求，尤其适用于非方阵线性方程组，其中方程数与特征数的比例较高（高瘦型方程组）或较低（宽型方程组）。准确性高且易于控制，数值结果突出了所提算法在计算时间、解的准确性和内存需求方面的效率。论文还包括了算法收敛性的理论证明，并将所提算法理论推广到特征选择。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种以$\mathcal{O}(mn)$时间复杂度求解线性方程组的新算法，具有快速、向量化、低内存分配需求等特点，并在非方阵线性方程组中表现出较高的准确性与效率。算法收敛性得到理论证明，同时还使用这一算法解决了特征选择问题。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a novel algorithm for solving systems of linear equations with a time complexity of $\mathcal{O}(mn)$, which is fast, vectorized, and requires low memory allocation. It achieves high accuracy and efficiency for non-square systems of equations, and extends the algorithm to feature selection.
